title: Our mission
subtitle: We offer tailor-made Business Development support in the Automotive OE (Original Equipment) sector, adapting ourselves to the needs of our partners.

localExpertise.title: Local Expertise
localExpertise.description: Deep market knowledge in France, Italy, Benelux and Spain with on-the-ground presence and cultural understanding

projectManagement.title: Complete Project Management
projectManagement.description: From project award to SOP (Start of Production), we provide comprehensive program management throughout the development phase and series production.

agileResponse.title: Agile Response
agileResponse.description: We intervene effectively in the event of engineering modifications, technical obstacles, quality or logistics issues. Our lean structure ensures rapid adaptation.

beyondSales.title: Beyond Sales Support
listItems: Recruitment assistance for technical profiles and resident engineers
Network facilitation for industrial partnerships and joint ventures
